course_title: Topics in Bayesian Analysis and Decision Theory - VARIATIONALBAYES

sections.comments: Variational Bayesian MethodsThis course will provide an introduction to modern optimization-based inference methods in Bayesian statistics, with an emphasis on practical implementation and validation of results. Along the way, we will cover common pitfalls in computational statistics and how to avoid them, other illustrative optimization problems from statistics, and a light introduction to some useful theory.
